pullRequest.title: Use the latest available ASM version
pullRequest.bodyText:
The plugin manager will fail to load all the expected classes if it encounters any that use class-file features not supported by the specified ASM version.
Fixes: #9985.

commit.message:
Use the latest available ASM version

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Seems we need a persistent issue to keep this updated. Java 16 builds will start happening soon I hope.
